text: Hirnyk () is a surname of Ukrainian origin. It literally means a miner (occupation). ==Notable Hirnyks== * Oleksa Hirnyk (1912–1978), Hero of Ukraine, a Soviet dissident, burned himself in protest against Russification ==See also== * Eastern Slavic naming customs ==External links== The origin of names and surnames Category:Ukrainian-language surnames
title: Hirnyk (surname)
